name: The Mental Wheel
description:
You participate in a driving gameshow extravaganza, where your broken ride becomes a frankenstein of other cars! Also, to add to the instability, the host randomly adds crazy modifiers to your experience, to make it harder to get to the end! Try getting through the track as fast as you can!

HOW TO PLAY! 

W - accelerate 

S - brakes

A - left 

D - right

Game developed during the Ludum Dare 49 in 72 hours.
